Do you have questions about the Code of Practice?
Industry participants can now call 13 49 42 (13 GWIC) to make an appointment to speak with someone one-on-one, over the phone…

Our Greyhounds

In 2016 the NSW greyhound racing industry made a commitment to prioritise and improve animal welfare across the sport. Our Greyhounds is an information hub for the NSW greyhound racing industry filled with tips and resources that make meeting the industry’s animal welfare standards simple and easy.

This site also provides information on industry data and lifecycle tracking…. etc etc etc
